name: Jesse_Richards_Prototypes
description:
Changing Seasons - A game where the player needs to click the correct spice. Reset does not work due to lack of knowledge in processing.

Gravity/ Space - The player has to click on the planets to keep themselves in the planet ring for as long as possible.

Revenge Racing - Player must dodge the garbage to get to work on time. Ending is currently bugged. There was a bug before uploading where if you wait 5 second before entering the game, you would automatically lose. It seems to be fixed, but to avoid it, start the game from the main menu A.S.A.P

Tangible Media - Player has to navigate a path with obstacle to get the the podium at the end.
